name: Admonition From Ancestors
desc: A brief but poignant admonition left by the Balakin ancestors.

volumes.title: Admonition From Ancestors
volumes.localDesc:
To the descendants of the Balakin family,



Never let go of the wrench and drill in your hands.


Refrain from both belligerence and sycophancy.


With the wrench and drill in hand, you have the power to change the world.



Richard Balakin
